dct_title_s: Map showing the survey of lands lying under the waters of the Hudson River & Bay of New York and of lands adjacent thereto
dct_description_sm: Map shows the Passaic River, Newark, Harrison, Elizabeth Port, Shooters Island, Elizabeth, Kill Van Kull, Staten Island, Bergen Point, Bayonne, Newark Bay, Hackensack River, Greenville, Jersey City, Hoboken, Hudson River, NYC, East River, Governor's Island, Buttermilk Channel, Brooklyn, New York Bay, Bedloe's Island, Oyster Island, Ellis Island, and a proposed Channel, exterior line for solid filling, and exterior like for piers.
dct_rights_sm: This resource may be copyright protected. You may make use of this resource, with proper attribution, for educational and other non-commercial uses only. Contact the contributing organization to obtain permission for reproduction, publication, and commercial use.
